abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Marill from your hand onto Azurill (this counts as evolving Azurill), and remove all damage counters from Azurill.

attacks.name: Jump Catch
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
